Hero.title: Bareng Mas Redho. Kabeh Masalah, Di gawe santai ae!

About.title: Hello world!
About.name: Redho Arifin
About.desc: Full-stack Developer, Aku duwe minat kanggo sinau ngembangake aplikasi web saka sisih ngarep lan mburi. Kanthi keahlian ing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, lan desain web responsif, aku ngupayakake mbangun antarmuka pangguna sing menarik lan fungsional. Kajaba iku, aku uga cukup trampil nggunakake kontrol versi (Git) lan mbangun lan nggabungake API RESTful, sing ngidini aku nangani kabeh siklus pangembangan piranti lunak saka pangembangan tampilan menyang manajemen database lan logika server.

Project.desc: Project Learning is sure to be updated as technology evolves.

Bio.desc: I am a D2 graduate of Informatics Engineering from Lamongan State Community Academy. Currently, I am studying PJJ D3 at Politeknik Elektronika Negeri Surabaya with a focus on development as a developer, both for mobile applications and websites.
Bio.name: Redho Arifin
Bio.study-1: D2 Informatics Engineering at AKN Lamongan (2018 - 2020)
Bio.study-2: D3 Informatics Engineering at PENS (2023 - Present)
Bio.experience-1: Intership 1 year (2021 - 2022) at Staff Admin BMH Gerai Lamongan, Indonesia
Bio.experience-2: Internship 6 months (2023 - 2024) at IT Support CV. Natusi, Mojokerto, Indonesia
